I wrote:
> This issue is also bug #972496:
> 
> http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=972496&group_id=73833&atid=539099
> 
> However, I can't reproduce this.

Nevermind. I can reproduce this, as long as the launch command is for
an order file in the current working directory. That is, just as the
problem was reported:

  $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix -n order.xml

I had been trying instead, from $HERITRIX_HOME...

  bin/heritrix -n jobs/test/order.xml

...which worked fine. This suggests a temporary workaround: always
prepend some extra path info to an order file, for example:

  $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix -n ./order.xml

However, I have also fixed this in CVS.

Thanks for the report!

- Gordon @ IA
